title: ET Prime Special Series - Part 3 - How to think & scan like an auditor before investing: Assets a wall of strength or just a paper fort?
content:
This series is about gaining a deeper understanding of how companies report numbers and hide the reality of their business. It aims to go beyond the numbers to the decisions, judgements, and assumptions behind them. By following these insights, investors can become better at analysing financial statements (if they even think that is important), spotting risks, and making informed decisions. Why is this important to know? Look at the number of start-ups that, at the time of their IPOs, announce that they have made profits – only to report losses the very next quarter, and justify them. And not only start-ups. There are many in the listed space who do this – again and again.
